description: Gov. Larry Hogan of Maryland declared a state of emergency and activated the National Guard when riots broke out after the funeral of Freddie Gray.
title: Mapping the Clashes Between Baltimore Police and Protesters
title_page: Mapping the Clashes Between Baltimore Police and Protesters - The New York Times
maintext: In the Sandtown-Winchester area where Mr. Gray was chased by police officers, life expectancy is 69.7 years, on par with Iraq and Kazakhstan. In many of the neighborhoods where violence has flared, life expectancies, incomes and other quality-of-life measures are far below the American average. Some of the areas with the lowest life expectancy, like Seton Hill, where Lexington Market was looted on Monday, also have the highest poverty rates and are home to a large percentage of African-Americans.
